author: sharron
text:
This platform needs investigating
I have lost money as a buyer and as a seller
I purchased a mulberry bag, on arrival it was clearly a fake so i reported an issue and requested to return it for a refund. They said they were investigating it and requesting more evidence from the seller. I got a message that the bag was authentic and the seller was paid instantly. So i listed the bag to resell, within 10 mins vinted deleted it, telling me it was fake, they threatened to close my account if i tried to list it again.
I sold a bundle of 3 items two were £30+ and one just £2.50 The buyer reported a dot on the lower priced item and requested to return for a refund. I clicked to accept, instantly vinted refunded the full amount and manually cancelled the transaction. No returns information. NOTHING
They told me they do not provide partial refunds, and told me i had cancelled the transaction myself and paid her back in full. I did no such thing, the message said the transaction had been manually cancelled by VINTED. They said i would have to deal with the customer outside of vinted, maybe she would agree to refund me via bank transfer. YEAH RIGHT
This is why 80% of the bags listed are fakes, and why it is a breeding ground for scammers.
Vinted make millions through the payment protection they charge on every transaction, the only time they ever refund is when it can be proved the couriers lost it. Then there is £50 maximum you can claim, and it takes weeks and weeks before they will investigate it.
On both occasions i contacted them with my issues. They gave their decision and then blocked me from being able to contact them again about these transactions.
How they are allowed to trade is beyond me.
I wonder why they have never responded to any of the reviews. They do not try and defend themselves because they can`t.
Second-hand fashion platform Vinted is already worth 3.5 billion euros. Vinted, an online platform for second-hand clothing, raised 250 million euros to support its further expansion. During the financing round, the Lithuanian company was estimated to be worth 3.5 billion euros.12 May 2021
title: This platform needs investigating

text: What a pity I can’t give zero stars! Utterly shambolic and incompetent. Wish I had read the reviews first! I contacted Vinted prior to setting up an account as I am in UK but my billing address is overseas, so I wanted to check I wouldn’t run into problems, before investing time and effort in listing everything for sale. Quote: “There will be no issues….even if the billing address is not in the UK” Apparently NOT SO as I found out when someone attempted to purchase one of the items I advertised…..took 3 days for Vinted to tell me I couldn’t use a billing address outside UK. author: E C
text:
Wish I could give Vinted no stars! 

Vinted is full of scammers & they offer no real protection to buyers or sellers. 

They charge you for 'buyer protection' which only covers the item. - You have to return it fully tracked at your own expense - which can often cost more than the item.
 
One seller sent completely different item to the one I purchased. Another sent an item so bad, I wouldn't clean the floor with it.  That's almost £20 wasted in just a couple sales. 

The last seller didn't even bother to send the item or reply to messages and Vinted left me an auto negative review for cancelling after 5 days. 

All that money sitting in Vinteds holding account waiting for their non existent customer service to sort out the issue. They're laughing all the way to the bank. 

If you do finally get hold of customer services, they are rude & unhelpful & a true reflection of how awful this site is for buyers & sellers.
title: Shockingly bad experience.

author: LOLA
text:
VINTED team is a real thief.
They do not take responsibilities for their mistakes nor problems happening on the consumer journey.
Lately, I’ve shipped a pair of shoes via VINTED, new with tag on -which I bought for 220€ In store- to a buyer on the app for 165€. The parcel was lost, and I had to chase them to get a proper answer. Eventually, they promised a full compensation, but I only got 25€ refunded, amount which was actually paid by the transporter. VINTED is not compensating one single euro from their pocket to sellers, who literally lost their item, and obviously doesn’t think at all about working out proper insurance in order to protect its users. 
I am honestly shocked by the terrible customer service I just experienced…
title: Run away. VINTED is a thief
